se.mattec.id2212.project.view

Class AdminManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.mattec.id2212.project.view.AdminManager

  • @Named(value="AdminManager")
public class AdminManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A manager linking between the JSF user interface and the application logic in AdminBean.
